name: Sweet Smash - Merry Christmas
description:
Match tasty cookie in this fun and challenging match 3 adventure!

MAIN FEATURES:
- 1200+ addictive puzzles with more added all the time!
- Amazing arsenal of powerups & combos!
- Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
- Stunning graphics & adorable animations!
developers: Yummy Nature - Casual Game of Star Crush
